sentences.english: The city government will give a dinner to welcome the foreigners.
sentences.chinese: 市政府将设宴招待这些外宾，以示欢迎。

sentences.english: The foreign guests were motored from the airfield to the guest house.
sentences.chinese: 汽车把外宾从机场送到宾馆。

sentences.english: To be responsible for the foreign-related protocol arrangement and administration, and reception for foreign guests.
sentences.chinese: 负责银监会涉外礼宾安排和管理，接待外宾来访。

sentences.english: These foreign visitors are English, who stay at the Park Hotel.
sentences.chinese: 这些外宾是英国人，住在国际饭店。

sentences.english: There are many foreign people in Lido Hotel?
I feel very much out-of-place in last night's reception for a foreign dignitary.
sentences.chinese: 我在昨晚一个接待重要外宾的宴会里，觉得很不适应。

sentences.english: There are many hotels where foreign guests are permitted to stay overnight in taizhou city.
sentences.chinese: 泰州市有多家涉外饭店可以接待外宾。

sentences.english: Invite in the local excellencies and other important foreign guests to attend.
sentences.chinese: 邀请驻在当地的各国使节和其他重要外宾参加。

sentences.english: Every foreign visitor takes a great fancy to this traditional Chinese painting.
sentences.chinese: 每一个外宾都十分喜欢这张中国画。

sentences.english: The foreign guests reveled in the scenery of the lake .
sentences.chinese: 外宾们十分喜爱湖上的景色。

sentences.english: The foreign guests will call on you next Wednesday afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 外宾将在下周星期三下午拜访你。

sentences.english: Stage shows were laid on to entertain the foreign guests.
sentences.chinese: 安排几场演出招待那些外宾。

sentences.english: The foreigners wish to visit Peony Yard of Cao Zhou.
sentences.chinese: 外宾希望到曹州牡丹园参观。

sentences.english: Around 30 overseas visitors are due to arrive tomorrow afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 明天下午将有三十位外宾来访。

sentences.english: The Shanghai Oriental Art Center looks like a butterfly from above.
sentences.chinese: 向外宾介绍上海东方艺术中心象只蝴蝶。

sentences.english: The foreign guests are trying chopsticks.
sentences.chinese: 外宾们纷纷试着使筷子。

definition: to receive (a visitor)/to admit (allow sb to enter)
to go and visit in an official capacity or for investigation
to receive sb/to grant an interview
guest from the same country/internal or domestic visitor (as opposed to international guest 外賓|外宾)
